001package gust.backend;
002
003import com.google.template.soy.SoyFileSet;
004import com.google.template.soy.jbcsrc.api.SoySauce;
005import com.google.template.soy.jbcsrc.api.SoySauceBuilder;
006import com.google.template.soy.shared.SoyCssRenamingMap;
007import com.google.template.soy.shared.SoyIdRenamingMap;
008import io.micronaut.views.soy.SoyFileSetProvider;
009import io.micronaut.views.soy.SoyNamingMapProvider;
010
011import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
012import javax.annotation.Nullable;
013import javax.inject.Singleton;
014
015
016/** Default Soy template provider. */
017@Singleton
018public final class TemplateProvider implements SoyFileSetProvider, SoyNamingMapProvider {
019  /** Default set of templates, detected from the classpath. */
020  private static final @Nonnull SoySauce defaultCompiledTemplates;
021
022  /** Templates explicitly provided by the developer. */
023  private @Nullable SoySauce overrideTemplates = null;
024
025  /** CSS class renaming map to apply during render. */
026  private @Nullable SoyIdRenamingMap idRenamingMap = null;
027
028  /** CSS ID renaming map to apply during render. */
029  private @Nullable SoyCssRenamingMap cssRenamingMap = null;
030
031  static {
032    defaultCompiledTemplates = new SoySauceBuilder().build();
033  }
034
035  // -- Public API: Installation -- //
036
037  /**
038   * Install a set of compiled templates manually into the local template provider context. These templates will be used
039   * instead of any detected templates on the classpath (via the {@link #defaultCompiledTemplates}).
040   *
041   * @param compiled Compiled templates to install.
042   * @return Template provider, for method chaining.
043   */
044  public TemplateProvider installTemplates(@Nonnull SoySauce compiled) {
045    this.overrideTemplates = compiled;
046    return this;
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Install a Soy-compatible style renaming map for CSS classes, and optionally one for CSS IDs as well. These maps are
051   * installed locally and provided to Soy during template render operations. Any templates rendered subsequent to this
052   * call should have the rewritten styles applied in the DOM, and with any served assets associated with the page.
053   *
054   * If an existing ID rewriting map is mounted, a call to unseat it with `null` will be ignored.
055   *
056   * @param cssMap CSS renaming map to apply during render.
057   * @param idMap Optional ID renaming map to apply during render.
058   * @return Template provider, for method chaining.
059   */
060  public TemplateProvider installRenamingMaps(@Nonnull SoyCssRenamingMap cssMap, @Nullable SoyIdRenamingMap idMap) {
061    this.cssRenamingMap = cssMap;
062    if (this.idRenamingMap == null || idMap != null)
063      this.idRenamingMap = idMap;
064    return this;
065  }
066
067  // -- Public API: Consumption -- //
068
069  /**
070   * Provide a Soy file set for the embedded templates.
071   *
072   * @return Prepared Soy file set.
073   * @deprecated Soy file sets are slow due to runtime template interpretation. Please use compiled templates via the
074   *     {@link SoySauce} class instead. See the see-also listings for this method for more information.
075   * @see #provideCompiledTemplates() to acquire compiled template instances.
076   */
077  @Deprecated @Nullable @Override public SoyFileSet provideSoyFileSet() {
078    return null;
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Provide the compiled Soy file set for embedded templates.
083   *
084   * @return Pre-compiled Soy templates.
085   */
086  @Nonnull @Override public SoySauce provideCompiledTemplates() {
087    if (overrideTemplates != null)
088      return overrideTemplates;
089    return defaultCompiledTemplates;
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * By default, return `null` for the Soy CSS renaming map.
094   *
095   * @return `null`, by default.
096   */
097  @Nullable @Override public SoyCssRenamingMap cssRenamingMap() {
098    return cssRenamingMap;
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * By default, return `null` for the Soy ID renaming map.
103   *
104   * @return `null`, by default.
105   */
106  @Nullable @Override public SoyIdRenamingMap idRenamingMap() {
107    return idRenamingMap;
108  }
109}
